description: Argentina international wing Rodrigo Isgro extends his contract with Harlequins, having joined the club at the start of the season.
title: Rodrigo Isgro: Harlequins' Argentina wing signs new contract
title_page: Rodrigo Isgro: Harlequins' Argentina wing signs new contract - BBC Sport
maintext:
Argentina international wing Rodrigo Isgro has extended his contract with Harlequins, having joined the club at the start of the season.
The 25-year-old has made seven appearances and scored three tries in the famous quarters after representing the Pumas' sevens side at the Paris Olympics.
He scored 71 tries in 152 appearances on the sevens circuit and won a bronze medal at Tokyo 2020.
"I am very happy to extend my contract at Harlequins. My time at the club has been great so far and I'm excited for the rest of this season and beyond," he told the Quins website., external
"One of my dreams is to win the Premiership and why not the Champions Cup. I also want to continue to be selected by Los Pumas and represent my country, and I feel I am in the best place to do that here at Harlequins."
Quins face Northampton Saints in their last Premiership match before the international break on Friday.
